body:
Typing out the full url of a guild or user link will no longer result in the text parser awkwardly splitting it into two links.

Also, several miscellaneous API improvements, including more descriptive error messages for (user-caused) OAuth errors.
body_html:
Typing out the full url of a guild or user link will no longer result in the text parser awkwardly splitting it into two links.

Also, several miscellaneous API improvements, including more descriptive error messages for (user-caused) OAuth errors.
title: Patch 2.19.1 - Misc Bugfixes

author.bio: Let's be honest, we're probably all going to be convicted of wrongthink.
author.bio_html: Let's be honest, we're probably all going to be convicted of wrongthink.

body:
adding a trailing '/' to a URL still produces a 404.

IE: https://ruqqus.com/post/3jo8/patch-2191-misc-bugfixes/
